security: Revealing the arrangement for SVLUCK!â€™s wife and children to live at the address of Eliodorina Garcia, a POR member and director of a Kearby School used by PCA readers, could expose Garcia, the school, and the PCA readers to scrutiny or compromise their activities. Quoting directly: "S/1 ASSIGNED BY PARTY LEADERS HERE LIVE ALCHE IH KOHS OP ELIODORINA GARCIA, POR MEMBER, CALLE NO. 1, COLONIA: ROUTEZUMA CIA IS DIRECTOR OF KEARBY SCHOOL WHERE FIVE PCA READERS TEMPORARIL FARTERED. SI'S VIFE AND CHILDREN WILL LOVE WITH HIM AT ABOVE...PDRESS WHILE MEXI."
summary: A cable from Mexico City details arrangements for ATS SVLUCK!'s wife and children to visit him, including a request for funds and their lodging at the residence of Eliodorina Garcia, a POR member.
summary_one_paragraph: A secret cable originating from Mexico City relays information regarding ATS SVLUCK!'s family visit; his wife is expected to arrive in Merida by air on December 23 and subsequently join him in Mexico City for Christmas. SVLUCK! requested $158 for his wife's visit and to buy a Santa Claus for his children and mentioned a Christmas bonus. The cable also details that SVLUCK!, assigned by party leaders, will reside at the home of Eliodorina Garcia, a POR member and director of the Kearby School, while his family is in Mexico. A follow-up meeting with ATS SVLUCK! is scheduled for December 23.
title: Arrangements for ATS SVLUCK!'s Family Visit
